entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016
